findings.title: Timely massUpdatePools During Pool Weight Changes
findings.description: The reward pools can be dynamically added via `add()` and the weights of supported pools can be adjusted via `set()`. When analyzing the pool weight update routine `set()`, we notice the need of timely invoking `massUpdatePools()` to update the reward distribution before the new pool weight becomes effective.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In CryptoHeroes, the privileged account plays a critical role in governing and regulating system-wide operations and has the privilege to control or govern the flow of assets for staking and rewards.

findings.title: Suggested Adherence of Checks-Effects-Interactions
findings.description: The adherence of `checks-effects-interactions` principle is effective in mitigating a serious attack vector known as `re-entrancy`. The `deposit()` function in the `CryptoHeroesUniverse` contract violates this principle, which can lead to re-entrancy attacks.

findings.title: Recommended Explicit Pool Validity Checks
findings.description: The implementation relies on implicit bound-checks of arrays to ensure pool index stays within array range, but it's recommended to introduce explicit sanity checks by a new modifier 'validatePool' for validating given pools and their numerous occasions.
